title: All my loot icons are empty or blue squares
body: Opened a couple chests earlier and all my loot are blue or invisible boxes I have no idea wth anything is, skin and champion shards, the ward skins seem untouched for reasons I don't get.

replies.body: Ugh, well, updating the legacy client to see if it fixes it, annoying I have to sit through ANOTHER update.

This is a fairly rare issue that crops up on the Beta Client. You should be able to resolve this by hopping over to the Legacy Client (from login) to visit your loot and cause a new sync with our servers. 

https://i.imgur.com/drrzBd9.png

Let me know if this worked.
same thing here cant seem to see any of the skin or champ shards I've recieved
